mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE_INFO (COLLECT_TIME, SEQ, MOVIE_RANK, MOVIE_NM, MOVIE_RESERVE, SCORE, OPEN_DAY, REG_ID, CHG_ID) VALUES (#{collectTime}, movie_info_seq.NEXTVAL, #{movieRank}, #{movieNm}, #{movieReserve}, #{score}, #{openDay}, #{regId}, #{regId})
mapper.select: SELECT COLLECT_TIME, SEQ, MOVIE_RANK, MOVIE_NM, MOVIE_RESERVE, SCORE, OPEN_DAY, REG_ID, CHG_ID FROM MOVIE_INFO WHERE COLLECT_TIME LIKE #{collectTime} || '%' ORDER BY MOVIE_RANK ASC
